data.title: Elisabetha (Rech) Schlemmer (1821-1892)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Elizabeth (Rech) Schlemmer born 1821 Germany died 1892  including research + descendants + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Daughter of [father unknown] and [mother unknown]

[sibling(s) unknown]

Descendants

Died 1892 at about age 71 [location unknown]

Profile last modified 25 Jun 2022 | Created 19 Dec 2016

This page has been accessed 108 times.

Elizabeth (Rech) Schlemmer has German Roots.

This profile is part of the Monroe County, Illinois One Place Study.

Biography

Elizabeth Rech was born in 1821 in Germany.

Elizabeth married Jacob Schlemmer in 1840 in Herschweiler, Pfalz, Bavaria. [1] (See Research Notes below for full details)

Jacob and Elisabeth's daughter Elizabeth Schlemmer (1841-1920) was born on 28 July 1841 in Herchweiler, Pfalz, Bayern.

Jacob and Elisabeth's son Jacob Schlemmer (1844-1876) was born on 1 May 1844 in Herschweiler, Pfalz, Bayern.

Jacob and Elisabeth's daughter Caroline Schlemmer (1849-1924 ) was born on 11 April 1849 in Monroe City, Monroe County, Illinois.

Jacob and Elisabeth's daughter Louisa Schlemmer (1853-1924) was born in February 1853 in Illinois.

Jacob and Elisabeth's daughter Catherine Schlemmer (1855-1932) was born on 17 September 1855 Wartburg, Monroe County, Illinois.

Jacob and Elisabeth's son Frederick Jacob was born 17 October 1858 in Bluff Township, Monroe County, Illinois

Elizabeth appeared in the June 1860 Census as a member of the Jacob Schlemmer household in Waterloo, Township 3 South, Range 10 West, Monroe County, Illinois. The household included Jacob (44), Elizabeth (40), Jacob (16), Caroline (11), Louisa (7), Catherine (5), and Frederick (2). [2] (See Research Notes below for full details)

In September 1880, Jacob Schlemmer and Elizabeth Rech were named as the parents of Frederick Schlemmer, in the marriage record of Frederick to Susanna Bickelhaupt. [3]

Research Notes

Deutschland Heiraten, 1558-1929 [4]

Retrieved by Ron Johnson on 22 Jun 2022.

Abstracted by Ron Johnson on 22 Jun 2022.

NOTE: Surname misspelled as "Schlemme"

Jac Schlemme, age 16, male, white, born in Bavaria

Louisa Schlemme, age 7, female, white, born in Illinois, attended school within the year

Cath Schlemme, age 5, female, white, born in Illinois

Fredr Schlemme, age 2, male, white, born in Illinois
